Package pfriendly

Interface IYup2

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IUp
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Yup2, YupJ2
    public interface IYup2
extends IUp
    Maintains consistent behavior across 2D renderers that extend different branches of PGraphics, such as PGraphics2D and PGraphicsJava2D.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface pfriendly.IUp

        DEFAULT_ASPECT, DEFAULT_BKG_COLOR, DEFAULT_CAM_DIST_FAC, DEFAULT_COLOR_MAX, DEFAULT_FAR_CLIP, DEFAULT_FILL_COLOR, DEFAULT_FOV, DEFAULT_GLYPH_DETAIL, DEFAULT_HALF_HEIGHT, DEFAULT_HALF_WIDTH, DEFAULT_HANDLE_COLOR, DEFAULT_HANDLE_COORD_COLOR, DEFAULT_HANDLE_FORE_COLOR, DEFAULT_HANDLE_REAR_COLOR, DEFAULT_I_COLOR, DEFAULT_IJK_LINE_FAC, DEFAULT_IJK_SWEIGHT, DEFAULT_J_COLOR, DEFAULT_K_COLOR, DEFAULT_LOC_X, DEFAULT_LOC_Y, DEFAULT_LOC_Z, DEFAULT_NEAR_CLIP, DEFAULT_ORDER, DEFAULT_STROKE_COLOR, DEFAULT_STROKE_WEIGHT, DEFAULT_TEXT_LEADING, DEFAULT_TEXT_SIZE, MIXER_HSB, MIXER_RGB

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void arc​(Vec2 v, float sz, float start, float stop, int mode)
      Draws an arc at a location from a start angle to a stop angle.
      void bezier​(Vec2 ap0, Vec2 cp0, Vec2 cp1, Vec2 ap1)
      Draws a cubic Bezier curve between two anchor points, where the control points shape the curve.
      void bezierVertex​(Vec2 cp0, Vec2 cp1, Vec2 ap1)
      Draws a cubic Bezier curve segment to the next anchor point; the first and second control point shape the curve segment.

      Draws a circle at a location

      Draws a curve between four points.

      Draws a curve segment.

      Draws an ellipse; the meaning of the two parameters depends on the renderer's ellipseMode.

      • mouse

        static Vec2 mouse​(processing.core.PApplet parent,
                  IYup2 renderer,
                  Vec2 target)
        Finds the mouse's location in world coordinates relative to the renderer's camera.
        Parameters:
        parent - the PApplet
        renderer - the renderer
        target - the output vector
        Returns:
        the mouse coordinate

      • svgBackground

        static java.lang.String svgBackground​(IYup2 renderer)
        Generates an SVG rect element to replicate the renderer's background. Assumes that the background is opaque, i.e., has an alpha channel of 1.0 . Returns a String.
        Parameters:
        renderer - the renderer
        Returns:
        the string

      • svgCamera

        static java.lang.String svgCamera​(IYup2 renderer)

        Parameters:
        renderer - the renderer
        Returns:
        the string

      • svgHeader

        static java.lang.String svgHeader​(IYup2 renderer)
        Generates the boilerplate at the top of an SVG as a String based on the renderer's information. Includes the SVG's viewbox.
        Parameters:
        renderer - the renderer
        Returns:
        the String
